Author: Moeed#8715
Content: Hi there I need to ask if its possible to perform atomic swap with Cardano on BarterDex?

Author: Nabob#5004
Content: @cipi  can explain you better, atm , It Is not supported on our BarterDEX platform

Author: Nabob#5004
Content: Join #dev-tradebots  channel for any queries

Author: cipi#4502
Content: It is pretty simple: BarterDEX needs a wallet with an RPC-interface that supports some basic RPC calls like gettxout, importaddress, sendrawtransaction and so on... i couldn't find such a wallet for Cardano

Author: Seko#7408
Content: https://cardanodocs.com/technical/hd-wallets/

Author: Seko#7408
Content: I believe that the reason is, that ADA isnâ€˜t in BIP32 format.

Author: Seko#7408
Content: Same reason as Iota, correctly?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: not really

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: bitcoin protocol uses secp256k1 and a 2of2 multisig is needed to be supported

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: many of the newer coins use totally different signing, hashing and encoded

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: encoding

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: each difference needs to be adapted to in order for it to work and in some cases it isnt possible

Author: Moeed#8715
Content: so you think its not possible to integrate Cardano with any other chain?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is possible, anything is. just how practical and when it will be is the issue

Author: Moeed#8715
Content: for atomic swaps*

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: certainly lack of any external bounty for doing it, we are not likely to just say one day, "hey, lets start a big project to add atomic swaps to cardano and slow down the other projects we are working on"

Author: Moeed#8715
Content: ğŸ˜„ okay

Author: Moeed#8715
Content: can you please give me a direction on what to look if I want to build atomic swap for cardano

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: there is so much ground to cover... I would start with google

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it is a big giant project that would require intimate familiarity with cardano source code, bitcoin protocol and crypto in general

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: it could be the cardano core devs would not find it easy to do

Author: Seko#7408
Content: Cardano is at the beginning, but eventually ADA could be important. Currently Cardano has a lot of work to do until it starts...

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: so unless you are a pretty experienced blockchain dev, I would advise against thinking you can do it this decade

Author: Bar_F1sh_Rel#0834
Content:
Lol - I love people who say that a coin will have a huge market cap when FIAT collapses.
I thought the whole point was - if FIAT collapses we will need an alternative method of bartering for product and services - FIAT value would be irrelevant.
you need a new method of pricing - a website that values the currency against a tangible asset.
We need a goldmarketcap (in ounces) or breadmarketcap (in loaves) because that is real value and decoupled from FIAT.
